text: Amberscript is a SaaS software company based in Amsterdam, the Netherlands. Amberscript's technology allows converting audio or video files to subtitles or text. == History == The company was founded in December 2017 in Amsterdam by Peter-Paul de Leeuw, Thomas Dieste, and Timo Behrens. The first product was a speech-to-text in Dutch, an online tool that converts audio into an editable text file. In late 2018, the company made manual transcription and subtitling services available. In November 2020, Amberscript launched live captions with the state parliament of Mecklenburg-Western Pomerania. == References == Category:Technology companies of the Netherlands Category:Software companies
title: Amberscript
